name: proofread
description: Proofread and translate text using AI.

proofread.ai.vendor.description: Name of the AI model provider. Must be either 'copilot' or 'openai'.

proofread.ai.model.description: Name of the AI model to use.

proofread.ai.temperature.description: Sampling temperature to use (between 0 and 2). Higher values make the output more random, while lower values make it more focused and predictable.

proofread.ai.timeout.description: Timeout for AI API requests in seconds.

proofread.language.description: The language to proofread or translate the text into.

proofread.prompt.proofread.default:
Proofread the following text and fix it (if necessary) to sound like a native {} speaker. Use the following guidelines:

1. Brevity: Use concise language and eliminate unnecessary words.
2. Clarity: Write clearly and make sure your meaning is easily understood.
3. Consistency: Maintain consistent style and structure throughout your writing.
4. Active Voice: Prefer the active voice over passive for stronger writing.
5. Definite Language: Use specific, definite, and concrete language.
6. Omit Needless Words: Remove words that do not add value to the sentence.

Provide only the resulting text in response, without any additional commentary.
proofread.prompt.proofread.description: The prompt to send to the AI for proofreading.

proofread.prompt.translate.default: Translate the following text into {}. Use simple and clear language. Provide only the resulting text in response, without any additional commentary.
proofread.prompt.translate.description: The prompt to send to the AI for translation.
